items.content_html:
info 🌐 - Coding/Artificial Intelligence Research and Development, Currently training Myself to become a Full Stack Developer and Software Dev and looking into web development

                 🔔 Any questions or need to get in contact with us?

     You can contact us via Email at : matrixresearchcollective@matrixresearch.dev 

                                            or if you prefer more anonymous~ communication via PGP:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   0xy@proxiedmail.com

( if you dont contact me via PGP encryption i will not respond to any emails on this specific handle , dont know how to use pgp? then use https://mailvelope.com/en/  or google how to send/decrypt pgp messages and get back to me via my secure handle) 

 

                  also see my other projects at :  https://github.com/0xYc0d0ne

                                              huggingface :  https://huggingface.co/MatrixResearch

                                                      other contacts : 💻 Discord – rizzzilla
